summary: Red Guard Assassins train  by Crazy John, These girls wanna kill something.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Red Guard assassins that have been trained by Crazy John. After being beaten, tortured, abused by Crazy John these girls wanna kill something and they don't care what it is , as long as it bleeds. The only thing that their victims can hope for is to die with a smile on their face, and sometimes they get lucky and get just that.[/b][center][b]

Custom UUNP

[/b]
